meta_data.description: “Good Morning America” co-host MICHAEL STRAHAN joins Ellen today! As a Hall of Fame football player for the New York Giants, Michael led his team to many victories, including the Super Bowl win that capped his NFL career. Michael made the move to broadcast TV hosting gigs on “Live! with Kelly and Michael” and the game show “$100,000 Pyramid.” He’s here today to catch up with Ellen and to give us all the exciting details from "GMA"! Plus, Grammy winner SAM SMITH is here! The amazingly talented music star is stopping by to catch up with Ellen on everything going on in his exciting life. Sam is one of Ellen’s favorite singers, and we are so happy have him back. He’ll be performing a song from his upcoming album, “The Thrill of It All.”It’s happening now, on Ellen!
